alert.note: Alert for Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 8:11PM EDT until June 08 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Bryan County in southeastern Georgia... Chatham County in southeastern Georgia... Jasper County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 810 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midtown Savannah, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Doppler radar and Hunter Army Airfield gusted to 61 mph. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Tybee Island, Wilmington Island, Fort Pulaski National Monument, Hunter Army Airfield, Midtown Savannah, Downtown Savannah, Coffee Bluff, Montgomery, Thunderbolt, Vernonburg, Fort Mcallister, Sandfly, Savannah Historic District, Windsor Forest, and Isle Of Hope. This warning includes the following interstates: I-16 between mile markers 165 and 168. I-516 between mile markers 3 and 7. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
